amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $13 million in funding for National Weather Service's ground readiness project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to strike $13,000,000 in funding to "accelerate the National Weather Service ground readiness project".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 214 (Roll no. 17).

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Broun (GA) to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 214 (Roll no. 17).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Broun (GA) to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).
